original_title: Automate Your Pin Header Chopping Chores Away
original_content:
In most cases, cutting pin headers is a pretty simple job to tackle with a pair of cutters or even your bare fingers. But if youre doing a lot of it, like for kitting up lots of projects for customers, then you might want to look at something like this automatic pin header cutter.
Even if you dont need to follow [Mr. Innovative]s lead on this, its worth taking a look at the video below, which has a couple of cool ideas that are probably applicable to other automation projects, especially those where lots of small parts are handled. Processing begins with a hopper that holds a stack of header strips over what wed call a reverse guillotine, consisting of a spring-loaded plunger riding on a cam. A header strip is pushed out of the hopper to expose the specified number of terminals, the cam rotates and raises the plunger, and the correct length header is snapped off.
For our money, the neatest part of this build is the feed mechanism for the hopper. Rather than anything complicated like a rack-and-pinion, [Mr. Innovative] opted for a pusher made from a stiff yet flexible strip of plastic, which is forced along the bottom of the hopper by a pair of stepper-driven drive rollers. The plastic pusher is stored rolled up in a spiral fixture so it doesnt take up much room.
Overall, its a simple and largely effective design. [Mr. Innovative] does express a little dissatisfaction with some aspects of the build, though; it looks like the stack of header strips needs a little weight on top of it to keep them feeding properly, and we notice a couple of iterations of the cutting mechanism in the video. The cut headers do seem to either fly off into the stratosphere or stay attached to each other, which could lead to jamming problems.
But still, its a solid design and reminds us of some other projects by [Mr. Innovative], like this SMD tape slicer or a CNC gear cutter.
title: 自動ピンヘッダーカッター：大量のヘッダーストリップを効率的にカットしよう！
body: 自動ピンヘッダカッターは、ヘッダストリップを自動的にカットする装置で、小さい部品を扱う自動化プロジェクトに応用可能。ヘッダストリップがホッパーから送り出され、カムの作用で必要な長さのヘッダが切り離される仕組み。フィード機構はプラスチックのプッシャーとステッパードライブのローラーで実装され、シンプルかつ効果的な設計。ヘッダストリップのフィーディングには改善点あり。
titles: 自動ピンヘッダーカッター：大量のヘッダーストリップを効率的にカットしよう！
電子部品の自動化：小さなパーツを扱うプロジェクトにも応用可能なアイデアをご紹介
簡単で効果的なデザイン：ステッピングモーターを使用したピンヘッダーカッターの作り方
ヘッダーフィードメカニズム：ラック・アンド・ピニオンではなく、柔軟なプラスチックストリップを使用
実用的な工作プロジェクト：SMDテープスライサーやCNCギアカッターと同様のアイデアを活用したデザイン
